description: ⚔️ {attacker} swings at {receiver} with a sword! {receiver} loses **{rec_dmg}** HP!
🪑 {attacker} smashes {receiver} with a chair! {receiver} loses **{rec_dmg}** HP and {attacker} hurts themselves for **{att_dmg}** HP!
🐾 {attacker} scratches {receiver} with their nails! Due to mild discomfort, {receiver} loses **{rec_dmg}** HP
💥 {attacker} shoots {receiver} in the face with a shotgun! {receiver} gets blasted for **{rec_dmg}** HP!
🏹 {attacker} shoots an arrow from a longbow into {receiver}! It does **{rec_dmg}** HP!
🔥 {attacker} throws a fireball at {receiver}, engulfing them in flames! After putting them out, {receiver} loses **{rec_dmg}** HP!
🥊 {attacker} punches {receiver} with a powerful uppercut! {receiver} gets launched into the air and loses **{rec_dmg}** HP from the landing!
🗡️ {attacker} slashes {receiver} with dual daggers for **{rec_dmg}** HP!
🪓 {attacker} hurls a spear at {receiver}, piercing through their armor! {receiver} loses **{rec_dmg}** HP!
⚡ {attacker} summons a lightning strike on {receiver}! {receiver} loses a whopping **{rec_dmg}** HP!
😐 {attacker} does literally nothing!
💣 {attacker} sets off a bomb, hurting everyone when it explodes! {attacker} loses **{att_dmg}** HP, {receiver} loses **{rec_dmg}**!
🛩️ {attacker} nosedives into {receiver}, injuring both! {receiver} loses **{rec_dmg}** HP and {attacker} loses **{att_dmg}**!
✨ {attacker} summons magical rain, healing everyone! {attacker} heals **{att_dmg}** HP, {receiver} heals **{rec_dmg}** HP!
🔮 {attacker} casts a healing spell on {receiver}, restoring **{rec_dmg}** of their health! Why though?
🧉 {attacker} drinks a potion, healing themselves for **{att_dmg}** HP!
🍌 {attacker} throws a banana peel at {receiver}! {receiver} slips and loses **{rec_dmg}** HP!
🎤 {attacker} sings a terrible song to {receiver}! {receiver} loses **{rec_dmg}** HP from their ears bleeding!
🐸 {attacker} turns {receiver} into a frog! {receiver} loses **{rec_dmg}** HP from the transformation shock!
🍕 {attacker} slaps {receiver} with a hot pizza! {receiver} loses **{rec_dmg}** HP from the burns!
🧛‍♀️ {attacker} sucks {receiver}'s blood, draining them of {rec_dmg} HP and stealing {att_dmg}!
🙏 {attacker} meditates, regaining {att_dmg} HP!
